name: azure-observability-copilot
description: Azure Observability Copilot helps you monitor, analyze, and troubleshoot your Azure applications directly from VS Code. Query latency, errors, incidents, and more using natural language, and get actionable insights powered by your own backend or AI.

chatParticipants.name: azureObservabilityCopilot
chatParticipants.description: Monitor your Azure applications directly from VS Code! The assistant responds to queries such as: 'Is our Function App returning errors today?', 'Any active service health incidents in East US?', 'Whatâ€™s the average latency for our main API?', etc.

disambiguation.description: The user wants to know the latency, errors, or incidents related to their Azure applications.
